solution_line_template: As the groups are equally sized, they must each have {total_students} students in the class / {num_groups} groups = <<{total_students}/{num_groups}={students_per_group}>>{students_per_group} students in each group.

So each group takes {students_per_group} students in each group * {minutes_per_student} minutes per each student's trip = <<{students_per_group}*{minutes_per_student}={time_per_group}>>{time_per_group} minutes to go through the museum.
